What he does is, he

and then puts it into
the bottom of the wok.
And then he really heats up the wok,

And then he added a bunch
of different seasonings

and probably some salt,
I'm not sure what else.

And then after that he
cracked in egg and then mixed

it all up until it was
like a slushy omelet rice
mixture.

And the true genius of
what he does after that is,
he actually flips the wok over,
so, you would think gravity would make the

but somehow it stays on
the bottom of the wok
